da: Jeg har været i gang med det her et stykke tid nu, og det ser ikke ud til, at jeg bliver færdig snart.
Jeg ser en masse mennesker gå forbi, mens jeg graver.
Der er dog en ting, jeg ikke forstår...
Hvorledes kan det være, at folk kalder mig "Skovlfyren"?
Det er kun et par dage siden, jeg startede!
en: I've been at this for a while now, and it doesn't look like I'll be done any time soon.
I get to see a lot of people pass by while I'm here digging for days.
I can't wrap my head around one thing, though..
Why is it that people refer to me as "Shovel Guy"?
It's only been a few days since I've started!
The one nickname I REALLY don't understand is "Shovel Night".
Where do they get that from?!
Don't tell me... Is it because I shovel at night, too?
